name: Project Blaze
changelog:
• Keyboard binaries included with rom
  • Updated kernel, made it bit better
  • Some minor source change which i really don't care about
notes:
• Initial build
  • Play integrity not passing by default
  • Non RDP, with Gapps
  • Kernel embedded is in an early state, if you have better kernels, feel free to flash them (912 and any other kernel which haven't been updated won't work qpr2+ roms)
